sentence.Network_en: Our restaurant mainly serves Cantonese cuisine, including Chaozhou, Shantou and Hakka dishes.
sentence.Network_cn: 本餐厅主要有粤菜, 包括潮汕菜和客家菜.

sentence.Network_en: Stalks basil is used quite a lot in Hakka dishes.
sentence.Network_cn: 九层塔的独持香味深为客家人所喜爱,而被大量用在菜肴中.

sentence.Network_en: They are all Hakka people, and I could not understand their dialect.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们都是客家人, 说的客家方言我听不懂.

是客赣语群客语 (Hakka)的一支。客语 (Hakka)又称棚民方言、嘉应话、客家话或流话的。

means.word_mean: 1. a dialect of Chinese spoken in southeastern China; this form of Chinese is not well known outside China because few of the Hakka people have migrated
